content: This jar of <style=Highlight>Luca</style> is now full. Here, take it, and keep watering the Luca Arbor.

content: {A笑哈哈}Hoho, <style=PlayerName>{me}</style>, welcome back! Did you enjoy your first visit to the Galactic Bazaar? Maybe you were able to feel the connection you have with other planets...
